QuestData.Title: Fixer Upper
QuestData.Description: <Clay sneers at you and makes a sound much like two stones rubbing against each other.>$B$BThey've smashed all of our catapults. I've been trying to get this one working, but no luck so far.$B$BMaybe you'd like to make yourself useful. Head out onto the front and grab me any spare parts you come across.$B$BYou think you can handle that, flesh bag?
QuestData.CompletionText: Well? I don't have all day.
QuestData.RewardText: Well then. Maybe you're okay after all.$B$BAlright, alright... don't get all bent out of shape. Just give me a few moments with these parts.
